Description:
You have failed to ensure so far as is reasonably practicable that your workplace is organised in such a way  that pedestrians and vehicles can circulate in a safe manner, namely that you have failed to segregate  pedestrians walking from the welfare unit to the workshop and vehicles.

You have failed to prevent or adequately control exposure to your sub-contractors, to a substance 
hazardous the health, namely RAPIDAC HB PRIMER RED OXIDE.

You have failed to prevent or adequately control exposure to your sub-contractors, to a substance 
hazardous the health, namely MIG welding fume.
